name: LMNTRIX
0:
”Alexa, open ELEMENTRIX”
”Alexa, ask ELEMENTRIX What is my security status?”
”Alexa, ask ELEMENTRIX What are the details of incidents?”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: elementrix
Developer Terms of Use
des:
LISA short for LMNTRIX Intelligent Security Assistant is the voice extension of the LMNTRIX Active Defense enterprise cybersecurity solution. LMNTRIX clients can ask LISA about their current security posture, flash briefings, incident details as well as ask LISA to contain ongoing active threats on their network.

To get started, simply enable.
 the LMNTRIX skill and link your LMNTRIX account (supplied to you by the LMNTRIX Cyber Defence Centers). As an extra layer of security, you will be required to create a personal PIN.

Once you’ve enabled the skill, say “Alexa ask LMNTRIX….” Or “Alexa open LMNTRIX”.
